title: CSSTable Style

metadata.description: Learn about CSSTable Style with clear explanations and practical examples.

content_sections.title: Details
content_sections.content:
Table Padding
To control the space between the border and the content in a table, use the
padding
property on 
<td> and <th> elements:
First Name
Last Name
Savings
Peter
Griffin
$100
Lois
Griffin
$150
Joe
Swanson
$300
Example
th, td
{
padding: 15px;
text-align: left;
}

Add the
border-bottom
property to <th> and <td> for horizontal dividers:
Example
th, td {
border-bottom: 1px solid #ddd;
}

Hoverable Table
Use the
:hover
selector on <tr> to highlight table rows on mouse 
over:

For zebra-striped tables, use the
nth-child()
selector and add a
background-color
to all even (or odd) table rows:
Example
tr:nth-child(even) {background-color: #f2f2f2;}
